languages.text: Мир готовится к горячо любимому чернью событию — ежегодной гонке на гроксах через центральный континент. Сотни участников растили и тренировали тварей специально ради этого события.

The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.
languages.original_text: Мир готовится к горячо любимому чернью событию — ежегодной гонке на гроксах через центральный континент. Сотни участников растили и тренировали тварей специально ради этого события.

traits.locale_text: The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.
The world is preparing for a groxback race across its central continent. This entertainment for the rabble will affect the production of the planet.

The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.
The world is preparing for a groxback race across its central continent. This entertainment for the rabble will affect production on the planet.

The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.

languages.text: Le monde se prépare à un événement annuel extrêmement populaire parmi les gens du commun : une course à dos de grox à travers le continent central. Des centaines de participants ont élevé et entraîné les bestiaux spécialement pour cette occasion.
languages.original_text: The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.

traits.locale_text: Le monde se prépare à un événement annuel extrêmement populaire parmi les gens du commun : une course à dos de grox à travers le continent central. Des centaines de participants ont élevé et entraîné les bestiaux spécialement pour cette occasion.

languages.text: 毎年の恒例行事として庶民の間で根強い人気を誇る、中央大陸を横断するグロックス・バック・レースの準備が惑星中で進められている。何百人もの参加者がこの日のために獣を育て、訓練してきたのだ。
languages.original_text: The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.

traits.locale_text: 毎年の恒例行事として庶民の間で根強い人気を誇る、中央大陸を横断するグロックス・バック・レースの準備が惑星中で進められている。何百人もの参加者がこの日のために獣を育て、訓練してきたのだ。

languages.text: 这个世界正在筹备年度格洛克斯兽大赛，这项赛事在殖民地的普通民众中非常受欢迎。几百位参与者一直在孜孜不倦地饲养、训练格洛克斯兽，就是为了能参加这场盛大的赛事。
languages.original_text: The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.

traits.locale_text: 这个世界正在筹备年度格洛克斯兽大赛，这项赛事在殖民地的普通民众中非常受欢迎。几百位参与者一直在孜孜不倦地饲养、训练格洛克斯兽，就是为了能参加这场盛大的赛事。

languages.text: El planeta está preparando un evento anual extremadamente popular entre la población: una carrera a lomos de grox a través del continente central. Cientos de participantes han estado criando y entrenando a sus bestias para la ocasión.
languages.original_text: The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.

traits.locale_text: El planeta está preparando un evento anual extremadamente popular entre la población: una carrera a lomos de grox a través del continente central. Cientos de participantes han estado criando y entrenando a sus bestias para la ocasión.

languages.text: Die Welt bereitet sich auf ein jährliches Ereignis vor, das sich beim Volk gewaltiger Beliebtheit erfreut: Ein Grox-Rennen über den gesamten zentralen Kontinent. Hunderte von Teilnehmern haben die Tiere nur für diesen Zweck gezüchtet und trainiert.
languages.original_text: The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.

traits.locale_text: Die Welt bereitet sich auf ein jährliches Ereignis vor, das sich beim Volk gewaltiger Beliebtheit erfreut: Ein Grox-Rennen über den gesamten zentralen Kontinent. Hunderte von Teilnehmern haben die Tiere nur für diesen Zweck gezüchtet und trainiert.

languages.text: Dünya, sıradan halk arasında son derece popüler olan yıllık bir etkinliğe hazırlanıyor: Kıta merkezi boyunca groks sırtında yapılacak bir yarış. Yüzlerce katılımcı, sırf bu nedenle canavarları yetiştirip eğitiyor.
languages.original_text: The world is preparing for an annual event fiercely popular among the common folk: a groxback race across the central continent. Hundreds of participants have been raising and training the beasts just for this occasion.
